content.detailedDescription: I was sitting next to a camp fire on new years eve with about 15 people doing the same. next to other camps in glammis, california. a sand dune getaway. we were all sitting down lounging on beach chairs just enjoying the fire after bringing in the new year. the sky was bright from the moonlight and somewhat clear with a few patches of clouds. at one point i looked up to admire the sky and i kept looking all of a sudden i noticed a moving object on the sky.   as i kept looking i remember other people started looking up and noticing the same thing i was looking at. then one camp next to us started to point at the sky. we all began to say "what is that?" below the patches of clouds we all noticed a circular object, but it was not solid nor had any lights. the object seemed to be a transparent like saucer on being able to see the edge of it. like looking into a magnifying glass. moving through the sky the object was moving slow enough for everyone to see. it seemed to be about 300 yards or more. pretty high up in the sky. it seemed to be moving north west towards the light of the moon. i got up from my seat and i kept running trying to keep my eye on it and not loose it. just for the record i did not have anything to drink that night. not a big drinker. everyone else was but they all noticed the same thing. i have never seen anything like that, as soon as the object got closer to the glare of the moonlight we lost it. i just remember the object was huge and see through glass like. it reminded me of the movie independence day but like i said "transparent".  my friends and i still discuss it and wonder what it was. i remember that a few days later they announced on the news that there were some ufo sightings. i think it was in utah and texas. i just remember that the object was heading in that direction and i found it very unusual.
content.summary: New year's eve camp of 30 people witnessed a huge transparent disc.

content.detailedDescription: I was standing outside watching the sun set. i thought i heard a scream i looked up and saw it behind the branches of a tree i am a big believer of ufos studied them for two months and i knew what it was in about a fraction of a second. it floated there for like half a second i take a picture of it with my camera and it was gone. i looked at the picture and i got it barely. i was very excited.
content.summary: i was standing outside watching the sun set when i looked up and saw it.

content.detailedDescription: I work for a steel company located in east- aurora, colorado. it was wednesday, june 17th ( i believe ), late morning when this incident occurred. i was indoors at my desk- in the shipping-receiving department. it was around 11 am or so and the sky was clear with few clouds.  one of the steel yard forklift drivers called in on the radio to let us know that he was looking at an object that was hovering above high in the sky. he said that he hadn't seen any kind of plane or balloon shaped like this object and no motor/engine could be heard. my manager and myself walked outside to see what he was watching. it was hard to pinpoint or see due to it's elevation.  you really had to be focusing in that general area of the sky because you could lose sight of it easily but, because it stayed in one spot, we could see it.  it was cigar shaped and black in color. it seemed to bend on one end.  the object was elongated accross the sky but actually turned straight up and down at one point, then flattened out again.  when it did this the sun reflected off one side which gave off a goldy colored sheen.  it stayed in the same spot for about 35 minutes and during this time a plane circled the sky four times at a much lower elevation than the object.  we were all stupified as to what the object was. a couple of our sales people inside had heard that we were watching something in the sky and came out to see for themeselves.  no one could identify the object.  a co-worker grabbed her camera to take pics but the object seemed not to show in any pic and we couldn't get it to come up on our cell phone cameras.  the co-worker did manage to get one pic where the object could be seen but it looked like something you would see on a cellular lever under a microscope because she got the object but it also picked up three other shadow like dots near it in the sky that we did not see with the naked eye.  after hovering the object moved north easterly in the sky until we could no longer see it. one observer called channel nine news to report a strange object spotted in the sky and to ask if the airforce was running a test on a plane or spycam. we thought for sure that other people had to have seen it also. it was talked about around the office for the next couple of days and we all watched the news for some kind of explanation but heard/saw nothing to explain what was in the sky. i decided for ha-ha's to pull up pics of ufo citings. some of those pictures are really rediculous but i did find a picture of a cigar shaped craft taken in 1996 in the uk that looked exactly like the object we observed.
content.summary: A black shiny cigar shaped object with a slight bend hovering high in the sky then moved north easterly.

content.detailedDescription: I was entering the local ihop's parking lot in a car having a good time with my two kids, near the intersection of sheridan and 120th, going to a late lunch.  i glanced in the direction of denver and saw a rectangular object just above the obstructions on the horizon, oriented vertically, maybe 4:1 aspect ratio.  white like a cloud, no apparent markings or motion, sky was clear around it.  i didn't do a proper test at the time but it way maybe 1-2 cm tall at arm's length. also did not note the exact time. i presumed it was some kind of advertisement or balloon so drove a little further to try and get a better look.  then it appeared to get thinner and vanished, like a 3x5 card rotating so it disappeared when edge-on, and did not reappear.  then we went on to our destination.  my 6-yr old said she also saw it but is not reliable and i'm not sure she did.  i had attended a talk by dr steven greer thursday in denver, and we were in a peaceful and fun mood at the time, and i was probably thinking about the talk when i looked towards denver and saw the object.  i did not think much of it at the time, i'm not sure i consider any of this stuff really seriously, but do have an open mind and follow news on the subject.  and i would not have bothered to report but saw a report of what appears to be the same object, so decided to report my sighting to help confirm it.  this really makes me think twice about dr greer, who will be doing more stuff here this weekend.
content.summary: Saw large rectangular object in the distance towards the city of denver.

content.detailedDescription: I was headn home from silver city on us hwy 180 west when i saw two orange spheres in frount of me just above the mountin range. they where there for about 3 min or so then they vanished.This is about the secound time i have seen this in that area.

I stepped out of the backdoor of the storage building at the corner of ellsworth & broadway in denver and when i entered the alley and looked north, i saw a very large grey rectangular object moving on a straight plane, smoothly across the sky from west to east. i looked at it intensely while it was in view and i could not tell what i was looking at - it was unlike anything i've seen before. it looked like it was moving directly over downtown denver. it was moving at a decent rate and within a few seconds went behind a building in the foreground and i lost sight of it. i didn't see it again. an airplane went by shortly thereafter on about the same route. the object was much larger than the plane i saw just after. as soon as i got in my car i realized i had truly just seen an unidentified flying object especially since i saw a plane after it which looked so completely different in the sky.
content.summary: Very large rectangular object.

content.detailedDescription: My sister and i were outside of our apartment around 2:15 am smoking a ciggarette, which is the only reason we usually go outside.  i honestly dont know what made me look up in the sky, but immediately when i looked up i seen what appeared to be 2 lights moving at a steady pace high in the sky.  the lights were not blinking whatsoever and there was no noise coming from the aircraft.  the lights didnt even seem like normal lights on an aircraft at all.  looked more of a bright white glow.  after about 5 seconds of watching the object it seemed as if it rotated and a third light apeared.  the lights seemed to have made the shape of a triangle and would of probably been a perfect triangle if it would of passed directly over me, but i was watching it from a very diagonal angle.  it continued moving west from marion, where i was, toward carterville.  i watched it for about 2 minutes.  it seemed as if it were hovering and it would swiftly jump from left to right, which i dont see why any aircraft would.  maybe they want to be seen...  it was quite cloudly out and it was lightning a little bit.  i watched it till it faded out into one of the dark clouds.  i couldnt take my eyes off of it.  i felt it knew i was watching because the moment i told my sister i thought it to be a ufo it started making these swift movements.  i feel the people that see these sitings are the ones that can handle a little truth.  this isnt the first time i felt i've seen a ufo.  about 2 years ago in homosassa springs florida i seen what appeared to be a red/orange glow moving over the horizon in very odd directions about 20 minutes after the sun set.  it was very distant and was circular in shape(the glow of course.)  i was with my friend andrew and asked him if he thought it was a ufo.  he said he'd rather not think about that and walked away inside his house, which we were standing outside of. i watched this for about 6 minutes until it dissapeared instantly.  since then i've been in search of truth more than ever. even if these sighting werent of an et im sure the government has something up their sleeves. they dont have me fooled! if only they were so afraid of letting us know a little truth, but what can i do.  things will play out how they play out and only god has the mind power to change that.
content.summary: 3 lights moving across the sky jumping side to side.

content.detailedDescription:
I was in one beach near piraeus named kastela about 2300 i was making a bath with friends when an hour before we go i looked up and i saw something like star but much brighter like venus and i thnk that was venus but after a short while this thing star to make weird moves back and front and then after 2-3 minutes he started to make cicles and triangles moves that was the first day
the second day i saw it from my home again 8 km west of the beach he was making the same moves a bit slower 
the third day that i saw it just before the dawn 2 more starlike things appeard and passes the sky too fast 
and finally yesterday i was in the beach again and this time without lights and i saw something(4 of my friends saw it too the other was drunk)those star likes was 6 of them in the sky and when the one stops the moves the other starts to making a zigzag in the sky too fast and then it stop..
today i can only see venus in the sky but im pretty sure that i will see them again whatever thoese things are..
i take a photo of the first but its too blurry but you can see the difference in the color by the others start even with venus reflect on earth
content.summary: It was a star like i think and he was moving around making a circle or a triangle moves.

content.detailedDescription:
I was driving the interstate just west of moseslake to the south west i saw 3 lights flying. there where 2 odd things to this one being i have never seen an aircraft move like this i have spent many years in the army part of my job was servalance one thing you learn is features of aircraft. the spacing of the lights where cymetrical and looked even. the second was the location of the sighting it was over hanford outreach aks hanford nuclear powerplant. 


the object apeared around dusk the sun wasnt set yet so you could see very clear. it was below the ceiling. the object moved fairly slow and extramly smooth. there was no jetstream behind it. at which time this is what caught my eye it just vanished. i continued to watch the area around a minute or 2 later the object then reapeared for about 30 seconds. it was moving even slower but still heading in a westerly direction. i then noticed it do something i have never seen an aircraft do it did a 180 degree rotation you could tell this because the light facing north rotated to the point it faded and you could only see one of the lights at which point the object vanished. the sky was a slight overcast and i didnt see and object hit opensky anywhere in the are around there and nothing showed up.
content.summary: 3 solid lights none blinking object had obvious rotation then vanished.

content.detailedDescription:
I walked outside to smoke and took time, as usual, to gaze upon the visage of the heavens, though there were clouds spotting the sky.  all the stars out were familiar to me, and i was surprised when i looked west to have seen mars out.  everything i know of the planet, be it science or mythology, ran through my head as usual.

i was moving about trying to keep mosquitoes off me, yet keeping my eyes fixed on the celestial body.  i began to question myself, because i was unsure if mars was supposed to be visible at this time of the year.  at this point, my mild ocd had kicked in and i had the red planet fixed visibly inside the corner of an l shape made by a nearby tree.  as i was questioning myself, i began to realize: this was not mars at all.

it did not take any star charts to figure this out, because the so previously thought planet began to move directly up.  this is when i noticed the clouds it had been in front of.  it began to move side to side, left and right, yet still in an upward motion.  then it went into the clouds, not to be seen again.

i called a friend of mine who told me about this site and said i should report it.  so here i am, filling this all out.  i wish i had a camera as my alibi but instead my words here must suffice for the reader.
content.summary: Star-like object began to move higher after being stationary, and moved left to right.

content.detailedDescription:
The date of observation is approximate as this event occurred last fall and i was not aware of this website to report it at that time. 
i had just gotten out of work at 11pm est and was driving home. i glanced to my left to see the quick movement of a bright green orb/round object shoot straight down from the sky to the earth. from my view point, the object was at least two miles from me. at arms length, i would say it was the size of a quarter. as to it's actual size, i'm not sure. it was late at night.
it did not flame out, had no tail or deviate from course. it just shot straight down, no angles. there was no crash observed or flare up at beginning or end of observation. i suppose it went down behind the tree line, on the other side of i-26, northbound. at first i thought maybe i was seeing things as it happened so quickly but realized, no, i really did see it. i was so excited that i called both my husband and then best friend on my cell phone to tell them about it. 
i was positive it was not a flare, fireworks or a satellite. nor was it a reflection of anything inside my vehicle as i took some time the next night to discredit that possibility. the electric door lock light on the passenger door is green but is immobile and can't go up and down as it's part of the door panel itself.
content.summary: Bright green orb shot straight down from sky to ground.

content.detailedDescription: My husband and i were standing outside of our home facing east.  i was telling him about the orbs i had seen earlier this morning at my work.  i pointed to the cottonwood 'cotton' that has been flying in the sky and mentioned that i was not seeing cotton but white orbs.  just as i said that we both saw a white orb much higher up in the sky traveling from northeast to northwest.  my husband estimates that the object was traveling about mach 2 or 3 (he is an aviation enthusiast) and no sonic boom was detected.
content.summary: White orb circle moving very fast in sky toward mountains.

content.detailedDescription: I was at outside at work and glanced up to watch a jet pass by.  right after the jet passed by i saw a round white orb stationary in the sky. i watched it move slowly toward the east but as i watched i saw two other orbs, one further away and one closer.  after about two to three minutes two of the orbs moved off but the one that was closer stayed in the same position.  just then two sivler grey orbs approached the white orb; they were flying together then split apart to go around the white orb and then rejoined after they passed and moved off toward the east.  i began walking around the building at the same time watching the orb and it never moved, but stayed in the same place.  i had to glance down for a moment but when i looked back up the orb was gone.  there was no one with me at the time.
content.summary: Three round white orbs in sky and two silver grey orbs passed around the white ones.

content.detailedDescription: My friends and i were sitting out at our picnic table and as always i watch the skies when a commercial aiircraft flies overhead. as we were sitting there my friend says whats that? i immediatly looked up to see a object at approximatly 15,000 ft.. i guess this altitude because there was a commercial aircraft at approximatly 30,000 heading south. there was a light cloud cover with breaks in between and visibility was good in these breaks. my friend and i saw an object traveling in a northbound direction.I have not seen anything that would remotely come close to what i saw.I havebeen observing aircraft for over 40 years.                                                                     the object had an estimated wingspan of 200 to 250ft..It was black in color with a cresent shaped wing.It appeared to have a fuuselage in the center with a series of concave shapes on the trailing edge of the wing.The object was not moving at a high rate of speed but rather seemed to be motionless for a brief moment. as the clouds passed to the south a break opened and it appeared again only for a quick moment.It was then that it disappeared to the north rapidly above the cloud cover.My friend will not come forward in this matter and i have since moved to spokane,wa.Please feel free to contact me. i have more to teell about other incidences that i have encountered over the years.I manufactured small aircraft for nearly 7 years so i am not a complete nut.
content.summary: Sitting at a table we observed a large black object overhead.

content.detailedDescription: I was jogging down a dark, country road thinking about ufos and aliens and wishing they would appear when suddenly a bright green fireball came streaking down from the sky. it had a short tail behind it and lit up the clouds before vanishing. a couple minutes later i saw a bright star-like object falling slowly from the sky in almost the same location. it did not have any tail at all nor did it pulsate or burn up like a meteor would have. it just fell straight down almost to the ground before disappearing. i thought it was a pretty cool coincidence that it showed up right as i was thinking about aliens. it was almost like they were giving me a sign. of course it could have just been a couple of meteors. who knows?
content.summary: Bright green fireball followed by falling star.

content.detailedDescription: I saw a very bright star looking ufo at a very high altitude. it was a bright moving north east. the amazing thing was that it pulsated once got really bright and grow in size that way for around 1 second that decreased back to what i have seen before, i was just amzed. at first i thought it might have been a satellite but after it pulsated so strong and seemed to pick up some speed afterwards it was just an amazing view. sorry no camera with me.
content.summary: Orb like ufo.

content.detailedDescription: A possible ufo crash could have sparked a fire at gin gin on friday morning, a man said he saw something fall out of the sky. this thing caused a major fire at gin gin qld but at first they thought it was a plane crash but it wasn't, satilites are likley but ufos are likley to.
content.summary: Possible ufo crash.

content.detailedDescription: Please contact me.Every time i send you's something computer locks.Takes a 1/4 second to cover an estimated 2-3 miles.I have video of 16 mins...Don't know how to reduce to send.Please call so i can send or have someone review here.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Black solid and faster than the eye.

content.detailedDescription:
I was on the front porch of the original pizza palace with my good friend dominic on june 3, 2009.  at around 9:15 p.M. (correct to 20 minutes or so), i saw in the sky, to the northeast, and at about 20,000 ft, two bright white lights.  i had been looking at the sky and the lights just appeared without seeming to come from anywhere.  i immediately directed my friend's attention to the lights in the sky and he confirmed seeing what i was seeing (we also discussed and agreed afterwards on what we had seen).  the lights appeared to belong to the same structure, for they were moving in tandem; but no structure could be seen - there were no clouds nearby.  the two lights were each circular, white, bright, and about 2.5mm in diameter from where we were standing.  at 9:15 p.M. in gainesville during the summer, it is dusk - so it was still sort of light out and the lights still appeared very bright.  they were flashing on and off erratically and seemed to be jumping around in the sky (not all about the sky - from the ground, not more than an inch in any direction).  the way that they were moving (the two lights possibly attached to a structure) looked a lot like typical computerized simulations of how electrons move - awkwardly, erratically, seem to be at more than one place at one time - like second 0:56 of this video  http://www.Youtube.Com/watch?V=gsf7jhwr6ng     except not as fast and, again, not as many - only two - and together.  we watched for about 7 seconds as the lights moved strangely, while continuing to move in an east, northeast direction.  after about seven seconds, the lights stopped moving erratically and just seemed to fly in a straight line, out of our field of vision (past some trees).  there was no sound we could hear coming from the aircraft.
     the jackson naval air station is located to the northeast of gainesville, and the eglin air force base is to the west, in the panhandle.  i don't think that what we saw belongs to either of the air force bases because what we saw did not come from anywhere.  it just appeared in the sky.  (unless the government was testing a flying object back-engineered from ufos or created with some secret innovation being kept from other american engineers and the u.S. department of transportation, and they'd forgotten to turn their lights on until they had flown about 200 miles).
content.summary: Two bright, white, erratically flashing lights, seemingly belonging to one structure, jumping around in sky. seen 10 seconds then passes tree line.

content.detailedDescription:
No sound as two objects pased over head slowly.  red and abmer lighting on underside of both. my stepson, his girl friend and my wife were sitting outside talking.
 my stepson saw both objects eather come out of the woods or from over the hill.  at first he through it was a sky rocks but they kept climing and madev no sound.  i saw the objects as theyb passed over head and washed until they disapeared from view.  both kept the same distand and same speed.  both were steady as they moved,both moved from south to south east
content.summary: Two oval shaped objects came out of the woods or over a hill about half mile from where we were standing.

content.detailedDescription:
On this night, it was cold out and i was on my back porch smoking a sigarett. 
i was a 22 year preflight and delivery inspector for a large company her on the west coast, wich most of my years were spent on the flight-line.

i heard a very large helicopter flying over the town of arlinton and coming from what i suspect was the naval antenna aray area; off to the north in the mountains.
i waited to see what kind of helicopter it was, because i knew it sounded larger than the usual chinook. 
as it came closer, what i saw next stunned me.
it was two very bright lights about 50 yards apart and about a hundred yards behind came the helicopter.
i have  very good hearing, and with them traveling in a very straight line- i listened for an egine. there was absolutly no sound and no prox lights flashing.
they traveled in a straight line right to the left of our house about a hundred and fifty feet up and were headed due south.

after, i went into the house and told my wife, that something was up, because i had never seen aircraft like that before, in my just short of thirty years working with them.

i toltally believe that the government either knows about them, or has something to do with them.
i have been watching other stories of people seeing very simular lights, and felt i had to report this.
i am sending a picture of the type of helicopter i believe was chasing them.
content.summary: I saw two starlike orbs being chased buy a large us helicopter near a naval antenna.

content.detailedDescription:
I and my brothers were playing in our back field under the trees on the property where we lived in chevez reviegne,california,
i believe the street was named repolsa,when i heard a very very high pitched sound.It was like such a high piercing sound that it closely resembled what the squeel of a pig would sound like if it were amplified a hundred times over.It made me come out to see what was producing such a sound.Looking north towards elishian park hills i saw this metalic luster colored object.It was shaped like a "v" and it was slowly rising up from the hills with what appeared to be its nose pointing west.As it slowly arose horizonally,not turning in any direction,just rising slowly upward
is when i noticed the rear of the object was infact closed and not open as you might expect.Thats when the thing just disappeared.The whole experience probably lasted nomore than five minutes,but it left a life long impression on me.I was more intrigued,as one could imagine a four or five year old would be under those circumstances,than frightened.
after a while all of the houses were bought out in that area and our house,on the top of the hill,with the police acadamy at the bottom,was later removed.The police acadamy is still there.Its all still there,the park and the school that i attended near there, in echo park.But the big question remains too.Where did the thing i saw go?,and are there anymore like it out there?
content.summary: Witnessed ufo from chevaz reveigne coming out from eleshian park,california in the summer of 1949.

content.detailedDescription:
in 1946 i became a genetic engeneered hybrid...I have advanced abilities.   the cia,  and fbi and other groups have been stalking me,  and my kids thru three states for at least 6 years.  in my past lives i was an ancient,  in atlantis,  pompeii,  on the bridge of a space craft...I was a templar.....We have had many visits with different e.T.....In reno, nevada......Bakersfield, ca.....

    i found that my real parent is in fact a e.T of advanced abilities,  and power......Having to do with the white robes.....The cia is working directly with e.T to use me as an experiment to make the perfect hybrid..It has to do with in fact jesus coming back thru a dimensional worm hole.....

    i have the ability to pull energy from objects that connect to the pyramid on the dollar.....Bibles,  crosses,  any picture of jesus.....When we were in reno....I did have an encounter with the real virgin mary in the flesh.....I was only five feet from her....She stood about five foot 5..Small built......Delicate features.....Looked young.....She wore a light blue outfit they wore in ancient times.....She looked perfect......

    i have memories from the past that have come into the future as if they were in the present,  and i could feel them as if i was there.....

    i have had encounters with higher beings of great power......

  i have kept a record of the last few years of events.....The cia seems to be afraid of me,  and my abilities....And the visits i have had from e.T........

    we have had visits from draconian,  reptoid,  greys of different sizes,  human looking ones......

     would you like to know the rest of the story.....I may have something about e.T you will never find out on your own.....E.T have been coming after us for 7 years.......


              [cms/tg/pid]
content.summary: I have a detailed account of how e.T gets in and out of cities.  how the cia,  and fbi are involved

content.detailedDescription: Mi nombre es leonardo. estaba de vacaciones, cuando ven���a de la playa en boca de uchire, me dispuse a m���tomar im���genes panor���micas del paisaje, con mi c���mara digital sony cyber-shot, 7.2 megapixel, zoom optico de 3x, alta sensibilidad iso 1000, modelo dsc-s650, para ponerlas de pantalla de fondo en mi computador. al principio luego de la foto no note nada en el cielo, ni cuenta me hab���a dado que fotografi��� un ovni, cuando luego de un a���o, el d���a 12 de marzo de 2009, me pongo a ver detalladamente, a ver si por casualidad, pod���a haber captado la imagen del mismo. pasando y descargando las fotos en mi computadora, una imagen que tom��� a una antena receptora de telefon���a, a su lado casi invisible, estaba entre las nubes un punto blanco brillante, entonces pues mne dispuse a observar detalladamente la imagen, y creo que de verdad pueda ser un ovni, en experiencias recientes, a���os atr���s para ser m���s precisos, mi mam��� observ��� una luz brillante que sal���a del closet, y sali��� por la ventana, adem���s de poder avsitar en 2007, una serie de tres ovnis cruzando el cielo a gran velocidad. por eso no descartamos que el ovni de la imagen pueda ser alg���n fallo o efecto lum���nico.
content.summary: Ovni fotografiado en la localidad de boca de uchire (anzoategui, venezuela).

content.detailedDescription:
On the evening of 5/21/09, i noticed that the sky looked cool and the reflection on the pond behind my house looked picturesque.  so i took three photos of the landscape and noticed nothing unusual at the time.

a few weeks later, i uploaded the photos to my computer and on the first photo i noticed a moving flash in the center of the sky.  the next photo showed the shining object slip behind a tree to the left.  i found these anomalous pictures to be quite interesting.

i posted these photos on my facebook page and later noticed the the third photo shows the object speeding away on the upper right.  this is very strange and i have no idea about what it was.

i often take pictures of the seasonal changes behind my house.  usually i will shoot two or three photos.  what is strange here is that i believe that i took three pictures but there are three missing pictures?!  images 262, 263 and 264 never showed up when i uploaded the files and i do not remember taking them.   i am dumbfounded by this experience.  something quite strange was out there that night and it wasn't a cessna, a helicopter or venus.

et between recovered images:



1. img260 7:43:35
2. img261 7:43:38
3. img265 7:44:23 

higher res pix available upon request.
content.summary: I took three pictures of beautiful wetland behind my house, and a strange object appeared when i uploaded the images...

content.detailedDescription:
Approx 200ft up moving from east to west across an open field near the site of the battle of shrewsbury. large structured black triangle approx 200ft 250ft long and about 25ft wide. strange reddy orange lights on the corners and a very bright white light searching the fields from the front.
triangle made no obvious sound but i could vagley make out a very low humming sound that was irritating.
it passed almost directly over myself and my dog and as it did i felt a strange heat move through me. my dog was fine it just stood still and didnt make a sound but looked at the craft.
i watched it move very slowly across the field before it suddenly shot off very quickly to the west at an unbelievable speed i would estimate to be approx 3000 miles per hour.
i called raf shawbury to report the craft to air traffic control but they said nothing was picked up.
content.summary: Low flying black triangle omitting no sound but a strange heat source.

content.detailedDescription:
I was driving down the highway at 2:25am on june 19, 2009.  i was traveling west.  it was a clear, dry, hot night.  there were stars in the sky.  i was watching the road in front of me when out of nowhere, low in the sky appeared a bright green glowing ball which shot in a straight line at about a 60 degree angle down to the ground.  it had a slight haze around it and had a very faint, very short tail.  the light appeared in the southwest sky.  it was only visible for about two seconds.  it was much larger than any shooting star.  it looked like someone shot a flare gun from the sky to the earth.  it was the color of a green traffic light.

i immediately thought it was a ufo because it traveled so fast and in straight line.  i was amazed at the size and intensity of the object.  if it was a meteor it would have wiped out a city.  i lost sight of it at the horizon line.  it looked liked it would have made contact with the ground.
content.summary: Bright green fireball shoots to the ground over azle, texas.

content.detailedDescription: I had just gone to bed at 12:30am on 6/18/09 and around 12:45 to 1 am i heard what sounded like helicopters hovering over our rural home. the dogs heard the noise as well and were standing by the window when previouslythey had been sleeping on the bed.  i went to the window and looked out. i noticed that the motion detector light in our driveway had been activated, but i did not see anything in our driveway. as i looked up there appeared to be three very bright white lights in perfect alignment in a straight line.  the fourth light, which was red/white flashing, was a bit off to the left rear of the line.  our driveway is approximately 400 feet in length and the lights extended almost the entire length of it.  it moved very slowly and i could hear what sounded to me like an engine noise (low and not quite a helicopter noise as i had originally thought) consistently as it moved south  over our meadow toward the hill.  it did appear that the lights may have been attached to some flat metal (as in i was viewing possibly the underside of something)gray object, but i cannot be sure as we do not have street lights due to our rural location.  my impression was that i was seeing the underside of a large object though. i saw no markings anywhere and it was above the tree line height wise.  our tree's are very old pine trees so they are at least 50 feet tall.  it took several moments for it to disappear over the hillside.  the entire time the red/white flashing lights continued to follow it.  i am not sure whether the red/white lights were physically attached to the 'object' or what the case was.  my impression was that it was not attached.  i've never seen anything like this before.  this area is fairly rural and while we do get occasional planes flying over, i am certain this was not an airplane as the speed and noise were completely different.
content.summary: Heard hovering noise, kind of like helicopter, looked out the window and saw three very bright white lights in perfect line with another red/white flashing lite off to the left side.

content.detailedDescription:
A pink oval shaped object with a energy source behind it.

my family and i were on our way to a campground to visit my wifes parents 
and we stopped on the way to look at some windmills,we took some pictures of them.We did not notice anything out of the ordanery at that time.The pictures were taken on 9/01/07.On june 16th 2009 i was setting one of the pictures as a screen saver when i noticed the ufo
content.summary: Pink oval shaped.

content.detailedDescription:
First,i'm chinese,my english is poor.

the story:
i was waked up by the noisy of somebody's ring tone outside.
it's about 1:40,
i saw a lightspot in the sky, i thought it might be a star,
quickly i found it was impossible,for it's too light to the bad air in shanghai.
then i thought it's a plane or satellite,it can't be a plane because it didn't move,i don't know if it's a satellite,so i took it a pic.
before i took the pic,i thought it mast be a star or satellite an so on,when i saw the pic,i was confused,i really don't know what's on this pic.
i suspected that,although i use the selfshot mode to take the photo,it took 15s to exposure,maybe the wind or something else swayed the camera.
when i want to take another photo,the cloud hid the lightspot.
content.summary: Ufo in shanghai.
